String.Dest: The most elegant of instruments. The pinnacle of the bardic art.

String.Source: The chief wanted me to tell you... your boyfriend was real nice to us while you were gone.
String.Dest: The chief wanted me to tell you... your boyfriend was real nice to us while you were gone.

String.Source: Could you take a look in the basement? I've been hearing strange noises down there lately.
String.Dest: Could you take a look in the basement? I've been hearing strange noises down there lately.

String.Source: Is that how you want to play it, huh? That's fine with me.
String.Dest: Is that how you want to play it, huh? That's fine with me.

String.Source: I just want to get out of here!
String.Dest: I just want to get out of here!

String.Source: Well, well. You're a lot smarter than I expected. I hope you brought the gold.
String.Dest: Well, well. You're a lot smarter than I expected. I hope you brought the gold.

String.Source: Really? You mean it? Wow, thanks, Pa! I promise, I won't be any trouble at all!
String.Dest: Really? You mean it? Wow, thanks, Pa! I promise, I won't be any trouble at all!

String.Source: Really? You mean it? Wow, thanks, Ma! I promise, I won't be any trouble at all!
String.Dest: Really? You mean it? Wow, thanks, Ma! I promise, I won't be any trouble at all!

String.Source: No, I'm sorry. But there is land, available to you for purchase.
String.Dest: No, I'm sorry. But there is land, available to you for purchase.

String.Source: Oh yes, of course. It's available to you for purchase.
String.Dest: Oh yes, of course. It's available to you for purchase.

String.Source: Hm. Well, if you change your mind, come see me again.
String.Dest: Hm. Well, if you change your mind, come see me again.

String.Source: Then by my right as Jarl, I grant you a title to the land.
String.Dest: Then by my right as Jarl, I grant you a title to the land.

String.Source: Of course. It's available, if you want to buy it.
String.Dest: Of course. It's available, if you want to buy it.

String.Source: Let me know if you change your mind.
String.Dest: Let me know if you change your mind.

String.Source: Excellent. Then I grant you a title to the land.
String.Dest: Excellent. Then I grant you a title to the land.

String.Source: No, I'm afraid not. But there is land if you want to buy it.
String.Dest: No, I'm afraid not. But there is land if you want to buy it.

String.Source: Hey! I know. The Jarl's wizard could teach ya. He's lots closer.
String.Dest: Hey! I know. The Jarl's wizard could teach ya. He's lots closer.

String.Source: If that's what you want. I'll see you there, soon.
String.Dest: If that's what you want. I'll see you there, soon.

String.Source: The two of us, living together. I'll see you at home!
String.Dest: The two of us, living together. I'll see you at home!

String.Source: I can't believe my mother's gone. Now what'll I do?
String.Dest: I can't believe my mother's gone. Now what'll I do?

String.Source: I'm really afraid of Grelod. When Aventus escaped, she was so mad. I got double the beatings that day.
String.Dest: I'm really afraid of Grelod. When Aventus escaped, she was so mad. I got double the beatings that day.

String.Source: You'd better give me five septims right now, or I'm going to bloody your nose...
String.Dest: You'd better give me five septims right now, or I'm going to bloody your nose...

String.Source: Then by my right as Jarl, I name you Thane of Hjaalmarch. Congratulations.
String.Dest: Then by my right as Jarl, I name you Thane of Hjaalmarch. Congratulations.

String.Source: You really shouldn't be in here.
String.Dest: You really shouldn't be in here.

String.Source: Five, four, three, two, one... go!
String.Dest: Five, four, three, two, one... go!

String.Source: Papa may have wanted a son, but he got me. He's a lucky man.
String.Dest: Papa may have wanted a son, but he got me. He's a lucky man.

String.Source: Father says I don't have the knack for reading, but mama says I won't need it to work the farm.
String.Dest: Father says I don't have the knack for reading, but mama says I won't need it to work the farm.

String.Source: I guess we have our entire lives together, now. Where should we live? You could stay with me....
String.Dest: I guess we have our entire lives together, now. Where should we live? You could stay with me....

String.Source: My papa says I'm greg-gare-ree-yus, just like him! He says it means "smart," but my brother says he's wrong.
String.Dest: My papa says I'm greg-gare-ree-yus, just like him! He says it means "smart," but my brother says he's wrong.

String.Source: When I grow up, I'm going to be an assassin. That way I can help lots of children, just like you.
String.Dest: When I grow up, I'm going to be an assassin. That way I can help lots of children, just like you.

String.Source: I'll also notify my guards of your new title. Wouldn't want them to think you're part of the common rabble, now.
String.Dest: I'll also notify my guards of your new title. Wouldn't want them to think you're part of the common rabble, now.

String.Source: What're you lookin' at? I'm not afraid of you, ya know. Even if you are my elder.
String.Dest: What're you lookin' at? I'm not afraid of you, ya know. Even if you are my elder.

String.Source: If you can get Braith to leave me alone, I'll be your best friend... forever! I'll pay you, too! My whole life's savings - two septims!
String.Dest: If you can get Braith to leave me alone, I'll be your best friend... forever! I'll pay you, too! My whole life's savings - two septims!

String.Source: My mother taught me the millwork trade... you know, which trees to cut and which ones to pass up.
String.Dest: My mother taught me the millwork trade... you know, which trees to cut and which ones to pass up.

String.Source: Hiya! What's your name? Are you visiting? What do you do?
String.Dest: Hiya! What's your name? Are you visiting? What do you do?

String.Source: This is the happiest day of my life. Where should we live? My home is your home now, of course.
String.Dest: This is the happiest day of my life. Where should we live? My home is your home now, of course.

String.Source: It's a wonderful house, my love. If you don't mind, I'm going to start a small store. Something to do whenever you're on the road.
String.Dest: It's a wonderful house, my love. If you don't mind, I'm going to start a small store. Something to do whenever you're on the road.

String.Source: Mom says the Empire is mean, but I don't think they're that bad.
String.Dest: Mom says the Empire is mean, but I don't think they're that bad.

String.Source: This is the Old Hroldan Inn. Clean beds and strong drink.
String.Dest: This is the Old Hroldan Inn. Clean beds and strong drink.

String.Source: A good house. You chose well. I don't like sitting still, so I've decided to open a store. Buy and sell whatever is needed.
String.Dest: A good house. You chose well. I don't like sitting still, so I've decided to open a store. Buy and sell whatever is needed.

String.Source: Some day I'm going to forge my own sword!
String.Dest: Some day I'm going to forge my own sword!

String.Source: I've seen bigger houses, but it's yours, so I like it. Now, I think I need something to do if you're ever away, so I'll be opening a store.
String.Dest: I've seen bigger houses, but it's yours, so I like it. Now, I think I need something to do if you're ever away, so I'll be opening a store.

String.Source: Most days, I do all I can to stay away from my sister and my father. The beating's the same from either one.
String.Dest: Most days, I do all I can to stay away from my sister and my father. The beating's the same from either one.

String.Source: I know all the good spots! You don't stand a chance!
String.Dest: I know all the good spots! You don't stand a chance!

String.Source: I hope you're not here to start some trouble. I'll fight you if I have to.
String.Dest: I hope you're not here to start some trouble. I'll fight you if I have to.

String.Source: Papa says I won't see Roggvir any more, but he wouldn't tell me why not.
String.Dest: Papa says I won't see Roggvir any more, but he wouldn't tell me why not.

String.Source: Whoa! They killed Grelod! Ha ha ha ha ha!
String.Dest: Whoa! They killed Grelod! Ha ha ha ha ha!

String.Source: We're married. I guess we'll need to decide where we're living, won't we? You can always stay with me.
String.Dest: We're married. I guess we'll need to decide where we're living, won't we? You can always stay with me.

String.Source: Some day soon I'll stop being afraid. Jouane is teaching me magic. He says I'm real good.
String.Dest: Some day soon I'll stop being afraid. Jouane is teaching me magic. He says I'm real good.

String.Source: Married. It doesn't feel like I thought it would, but I'm happy. Where should we live? You could stay with me....
String.Dest: Married. It doesn't feel like I thought it would, but I'm happy. Where should we live? You could stay with me....

String.Source: I hate it here. Grelod the Kind is the meanest person in all of Skyrim.
String.Dest: I hate it here. Grelod the Kind is the meanest person in all of Skyrim.

String.Source: Derkeethus used to take me diving way down deep in the river. I miss him.
String.Dest: Derkeethus used to take me diving way down deep in the river. I miss him.

String.Source: Sondas takes care of me when mom's not around.
String.Dest: Sondas takes care of me when mom's not around.

String.Source: For a stranger, you're not so bad.
String.Dest: For a stranger, you're not so bad.

String.Source: Sissel thinks she's so special. No way she's more special than me.
String.Dest: Sissel thinks she's so special. No way she's more special than me.

String.Source: Papa used to say I was greg-gare-ree-yus, just like him. I miss him...
String.Dest: Papa used to say I was greg-gare-ree-yus, just like him. I miss him...

String.Source: Millwork sure is boring, but at least I don't have to work in a nasty mine.
String.Dest: Millwork sure is boring, but at least I don't have to work in a nasty mine.

String.Source: Why do they call it Left Hand Mine? Can the miners use their right hands too?
String.Dest: Why do they call it Left Hand Mine? Can the miners use their right hands too?

String.Source: We face the world together now. Where should we live? My home is yours.
String.Dest: We face the world together now. Where should we live? My home is yours.

String.Source: I... I don't have any money.
String.Dest: I... I don't have any money.

String.Source: I do hope mummy and father come to get me soon. Ever since that Aventus boy left, Grelod has been so angry.
String.Dest: I do hope mummy and father come to get me soon. Ever since that Aventus boy left, Grelod has been so angry.

String.Source: It will be our little nest. I'll be waiting for you there.
String.Dest: It will be our little nest. I'll be waiting for you there.

String.Source: When Aventus escaped, Grelod was so mad. I got double the beatings that day. But that won't happen ever again.
String.Dest: When Aventus escaped, Grelod was so mad. I got double the beatings that day. But that won't happen ever again.

String.Source: Grelod... murdered. Here. I... I need... air... You... you... Get out of here! Get out!
String.Dest: Grelod... murdered. Here. I... I need... air... You... you... Get out of here! Get out!

String.Source: Figures. You elders are always so boring.
String.Dest: Figures. You elders are always so boring.

String.Source: I don't fight Lars no more, if that's what you're worried about.
String.Dest: I don't fight Lars no more, if that's what you're worried about.

String.Source: Papa says I'm too friendly with strangers, but you seem all right.
String.Dest: Papa says I'm too friendly with strangers, but you seem all right.

String.Source: We're united, but where should we live? My home is yours, of course.
String.Dest: We're united, but where should we live? My home is yours, of course.

String.Source: I... I don't want to talk.
String.Dest: I... I don't want to talk.

String.Source: Aren't you a sight for sore eyes.
String.Dest: Aren't you a sight for sore eyes.

String.Source: Hi! I've never seen you around here before. Are you a miner too?
String.Dest: Hi! I've never seen you around here before. Are you a miner too?

String.Source: Someday I'm going to kill a dragon all by myself.
String.Dest: Someday I'm going to kill a dragon all by myself.

String.Source: I'll be waiting for you at home, then.
String.Dest: I'll be waiting for you at home, then.

String.Source: I'll see you at home, then. Don't keep me waiting!
String.Dest: I'll see you at home, then. Don't keep me waiting!

String.Source: A home for the two of us. I'll meet you there.
String.Dest: A home for the two of us. I'll meet you there.

String.Source: Our new home. I'll see you there!
String.Dest: Our new home. I'll see you there!

String.Source: All right. I'll see you there.
String.Dest: All right. I'll see you there.

String.Source: Changed the linens myself. They're fresh.
String.Dest: Changed the linens myself. They're fresh.

String.Source: I'm not afraid of anyone. Put a sword in my hand and I could defend this place if I had to!
String.Dest: I'm not afraid of anyone. Put a sword in my hand and I could defend this place if I had to!

String.Source: I used to hate it here, but it's not so bad anymore. Constance is real good to us.
String.Dest: I used to hate it here, but it's not so bad anymore. Constance is real good to us.

String.Source: Pa says I'm too young to fight in the war, but I can still help by patrolling the town.
String.Dest: Pa says I'm too young to fight in the war, but I can still help by patrolling the town.

String.Source: Have you met Lucky? He's my pet goat, and he helps me patrol the town.
String.Dest: Have you met Lucky? He's my pet goat, and he helps me patrol the town.

String.Source: Papa doesn't like when I talk to customers, anyway.
String.Dest: Papa doesn't like when I talk to customers, anyway.

String.Source: Come back if you want to play tag.
String.Dest: Come back if you want to play tag.

String.Source: Here. You deserve a reward for your service.
String.Dest: Here. You deserve a reward for your service.

String.Source: You stand right there and count to 10. No peeking. Ready? Okay go!
String.Dest: You stand right there and count to 10. No peeking. Ready? Okay go!

String.Source: Five, four, three, two, one... go!
String.Dest: Five, four, three, two, one... go!

String.Source: I'm strong, and quick, and can do any chore you want. Come on, adopt me. Please?
String.Dest: I'm strong, and quick, and can do any chore you want. Come on, adopt me. Please?

String.Source: You gotta have better things to do than talk to me all day...
String.Dest: You gotta have better things to do than talk to me all day...

String.Source: I was named after the sound a lion makes. You know: rrroooaaaarr! Really.
String.Dest: I was named after the sound a lion makes. You know: rrroooaaaarr! Really.

String.Source: Magic? That's dangerous. You want to learn that, go to that College in Winterhold. They teach that stuff there.
String.Dest: Magic? That's dangerous. You want to learn that, go to that College in Winterhold. They teach that stuff there.

String.Source: If there's nothing else, I really must ask you to leave.
String.Dest: If there's nothing else, I really must ask you to leave.

String.Source: I'll also notify my guards of your new title. Wouldn't want them to think you're part of the common rabble, now.
String.Dest: I'll also notify my guards of your new title. Wouldn't want them to think you're part of the common rabble, now.

String.Source: I grant you this weapon from my armory to serve as your badge of office.
String.Dest: I grant you this weapon from my armory to serve as your badge of office.

String.Source: I'll also notify my guards of your new title. Wouldn't want them to think you're part of the common rabble, now.
String.Dest: I'll also notify my guards of your new title. Wouldn't want them to think you're part of the common rabble, now.

String.Source: I grant you this weapon from my armory to serve as your badge of office.
String.Dest: I grant you this weapon from my armory to serve as your badge of office.

String.Source: Then by my right as Jarl, I name you Thane of the Pale. Congratulations.
String.Dest: Then by my right as Jarl, I name you Thane of the Pale. Congratulations.

String.Source: I grant you this weapon from my armory to serve as your badge of office.
String.Dest: I grant you this weapon from my armory to serve as your badge of office.

String.Source: Then by my right as Jarl, I name you Thane of Falkreath. Congratulations.
String.Dest: Then by my right as Jarl, I name you Thane of Falkreath. Congratulations.

String.Source: Grelod ain't going to like some stranger just hangin' around. Not that I care.
String.Dest: Grelod ain't going to like some stranger just hangin' around. Not that I care.

String.Source: If you drink too much, you're out. No drunks.
String.Dest: If you drink too much, you're out. No drunks.

String.Source: Don't have to tell me twice. But then, I'm not the one that buried iron under these mountains.
String.Dest: Don't have to tell me twice. But then, I'm not the one that buried iron under these mountains.

String.Source: Please, mister. You got to get me out of here. Ever since Aventus left, Grelod's been even meaner than usual. I swear, she's going to kill one of us.
String.Dest: Please, mister. You got to get me out of here. Ever since Aventus left, Grelod's been even meaner than usual. I swear, she's going to kill one of us.

String.Source: Have you met Torom? He's the best dog in the Reach.
String.Dest: Have you met Torom? He's the best dog in the Reach.

String.Source: Ten septims tomorrow, baby Battle-Born. Or I'm gonna bloody your nose and your lip.
String.Dest: Ten septims tomorrow, baby Battle-Born. Or I'm gonna bloody your nose and your lip.

String.Source: You're a guest. And father says we have to be polite to guests.
String.Dest: You're a guest. And father says we have to be polite to guests.

String.Source: This house is huge. I'll be tripping my feet all over this place. Hey, I think I'll start a little business here. Something to do, you know?
String.Dest: This house is huge. I'll be tripping my feet all over this place. Hey, I think I'll start a little business here. Something to do, you know?

String.Source: Yes. Braith bullies me all the time. All the elders think I'm a milk drinker 'cause I can't fight. Nobody understands.
String.Dest: Yes. Braith bullies me all the time. All the elders think I'm a milk drinker 'cause I can't fight. Nobody understands.

String.Source: Ain't nothin' a boy can do that I can't do better.
String.Dest: Ain't nothin' a boy can do that I can't do better.

String.Source: No! Please! I really don't have any money, Braith! I'll give you ten septims tomorrow. Just don't hit me.
String.Dest: No! Please! I really don't have any money, Braith! I'll give you ten septims tomorrow. Just don't hit me.

String.Source: Assur and I are playing a game. Don't tell him where I am!
String.Dest: Assur and I are playing a game. Don't tell him where I am!

String.Source: I wish I could be an adventurer like you, and go wherever I want.
String.Dest: I wish I could be an adventurer like you, and go wherever I want.

String.Source: Come to get yourself a kid? You're out of luck. No way Grelod will let any of us get adopted. Especially not since Aventus took off.
String.Dest: Come to get yourself a kid? You're out of luck. No way Grelod will let any of us get adopted. Especially not since Aventus took off.

String.Source: Watch your tongue, stranger. We don't take backtalk in this inn.
String.Dest: Watch your tongue, stranger. We don't take backtalk in this inn.

String.Source: Kill one person, and you can solve so many problems. I wonder at the possibilities.
String.Dest: Kill one person, and you can solve so many problems. I wonder at the possibilities.

String.Source: Mother wants me to work at the mill. But I ain't nobody's slave.
String.Dest: Mother wants me to work at the mill. But I ain't nobody's slave.

String.Source: Hey. You wanna play a game?
String.Dest: Hey. You wanna play a game?

String.Source: It's just me and my mother at the mill here. My father is gone. We don't know what happened to him.
String.Dest: It's just me and my mother at the mill here. My father is gone. We don't know what happened to him.

String.Source: I wish I was a soldier! They get to travel and stay up late and have fun!
String.Dest: I wish I was a soldier! They get to travel and stay up late and have fun!

String.Source: Teach them to stop paying me.
String.Dest: Teach them to stop paying me.

String.Source: Boys, girls, dogs, elders - there's nobody I won't fight!
String.Dest: Boys, girls, dogs, elders - there's nobody I won't fight!

String.Source: Hope Pavo will be able to go back to his mine soon. Everyone needs a home.
String.Dest: Hope Pavo will be able to go back to his mine soon. Everyone needs a home.

String.Source: Are you a soldier? One day, I'm going to be a soldier!
String.Dest: Are you a soldier? One day, I'm going to be a soldier!

String.Source: Then I'll see you at home!
String.Dest: Then I'll see you at home!

String.Source: You've proven reliable. There's a group of bandits in my Hold that I... may have had a few discreet dealings with.
String.Dest: You've proven reliable. There's a group of bandits in my Hold that I... may have had a few discreet dealings with.

String.Source: Get me mad, and I'll prank ya. And not a little. A lot.
String.Dest: Get me mad, and I'll prank ya. And not a little. A lot.

String.Source: Assur always wants to play "Hunt the Elf" and he makes me be the Elf.
String.Dest: Assur always wants to play "Hunt the Elf" and he makes me be the Elf.

String.Source: I am sworn to carry your burdens.
String.Dest: I am sworn to carry your burdens.

String.Source: Very well. I'll meet you there.
String.Dest: Very well. I'll meet you there.

String.Source: I will be back at your house if you need me, Thane.
String.Dest: I will be back at your house if you need me, Thane.

String.Source: I knew it! I knew my father was a hero and he didn't just run away.
String.Dest: I knew it! I knew my father was a hero and he didn't just run away.

String.Source: There's a new museum opening up in Dawnstar. The owner is asking me to hand out invitations to travelers.
String.Dest: There's a new museum opening up in Dawnstar. The owner is asking me to hand out invitations to travelers.

String.Source: The Stormcloaks are named after Ulfric. He's a bad man, but don't tell the soldiers that.
String.Dest: The Stormcloaks are named after Ulfric. He's a bad man, but don't tell the soldiers that.

String.Source: Mother says I shouldn't talk to people...
String.Dest: Mother says I shouldn't talk to people...

String.Source: My only concern is for the children. The poor darlings have no one else.
String.Dest: My only concern is for the children. The poor darlings have no one else.

String.Source: I trust you're not planning any trouble. What can I do for you, friend?
String.Dest: I trust you're not planning any trouble. What can I do for you, friend?

String.Source: The cut they were giving me was good at first, but now it's time to clean things up. Go and take care of it.
String.Dest: The cut they were giving me was good at first, but now it's time to clean things up. Go and take care of it.

String.Source: This house of yours is wondrous, at least to these eyes. I've thought about starting a store. Something to do here when you're out.
String.Dest: This house of yours is wondrous, at least to these eyes. I've thought about starting a store. Something to do here when you're out.

String.Source: I'll get everything ready and meet you there.
String.Dest: I'll get everything ready and meet you there.

String.Source: You look kind of scary. But nobody is scarier than old Grelod.
String.Dest: You look kind of scary. But nobody is scarier than old Grelod.

String.Source: Good to see you. Come on in.
String.Dest: Good to see you. Come on in.

String.Source: Papa says I'm not ready for weapons. So I make lots of horseshoes and hobnails.
String.Dest: Papa says I'm not ready for weapons. So I make lots of horseshoes and hobnails.

String.Source: You're new around here, so I'll go easy on ya. But don't get on my bad side.
String.Dest: You're new around here, so I'll go easy on ya. But don't get on my bad side.

String.Source: My friend Dorthe doesn't like my pranking. "You're being mean, Frodnar!" So what if I am?
String.Dest: My friend Dorthe doesn't like my pranking. "You're being mean, Frodnar!" So what if I am?

String.Source: There's not many people left in Winterhold, so I only have Assur to play with, and sometimes he's mean.
String.Dest: There's not many people left in Winterhold, so I only have Assur to play with, and sometimes he's mean.

String.Source: When Aventus took off, when he said those things, about killing Grelod... I never imagined he was serious...
String.Dest: When Aventus took off, when he said those things, about killing Grelod... I never imagined he was serious...

String.Source: Finally. I got stuff to do, ya know.
String.Dest: Finally. I got stuff to do, ya know.

String.Source: Strange house, but strong. Solid. I think I'll open a store. A task to tend to whenever you're away.
String.Dest: Strange house, but strong. Solid. I think I'll open a store. A task to tend to whenever you're away.

String.Source: I'm the older sister, by nearly five minutes. Sissel's barely worthy to walk in my shadow.
String.Dest: I'm the older sister, by nearly five minutes. Sissel's barely worthy to walk in my shadow.

String.Source: Why is everyone so upset? If there's Forsworn, the Jarl will take care of them, right?
String.Dest: Why is everyone so upset? If there's Forsworn, the Jarl will take care of them, right?

String.Source: Things are much better now that Grelod is dead, but still. I'm sick of this place.
String.Dest: Things are much better now that Grelod is dead, but still. I'm sick of this place.

String.Source: I don't have anything to say.
String.Dest: I don't have anything to say.

String.Source: My mother's dead, but I won't close the inn. I've hired Leontius to run things.
String.Dest: My mother's dead, but I won't close the inn. I've hired Leontius to run things.

String.Source: Constance don't care much for strangers in the orphanage. Afraid someone might hurt one of us kids. Which, I gotta admit, is kind of nice.
String.Dest: Constance don't care much for strangers in the orphanage. Afraid someone might hurt one of us kids. Which, I gotta admit, is kind of nice.

String.Source: Please, lady. You got to get me out of here. Ever since Aventus left, Grelod's been even meaner than usual. I swear, she's going to kill one of us.
String.Dest: Please, lady. You got to get me out of here. Ever since Aventus left, Grelod's been even meaner than usual. I swear, she's going to kill one of us.

String.Source: Are you new around here? You should go to the inn if you need a place to stay.
String.Dest: Are you new around here? You should go to the inn if you need a place to stay.

String.Source: Mama doesn't think I'm girlish enough. But that's just stupid girl talk.
String.Dest: Mama doesn't think I'm girlish enough. But that's just stupid girl talk.

String.Source: Assur says his pa says the College made lots of bad things happen, but the mages I've seen look nice.
String.Dest: Assur says his pa says the College made lots of bad things happen, but the mages I've seen look nice.

String.Source: Assur had to move away because of the Empire. But we get to stay.
String.Dest: Assur had to move away because of the Empire. But we get to stay.

String.Source: Constance Michel says we have to be careful of people we don't know.
String.Dest: Constance Michel says we have to be careful of people we don't know.

String.Source: The mages don't let us go in the College. They said it's not safe in there.
String.Dest: The mages don't let us go in the College. They said it's not safe in there.

String.Source: I can't believe it! Grelod is dead! She's really dead!
String.Dest: I can't believe it! Grelod is dead! She's really dead!

String.Source: Mama said I could help with the goats!
String.Dest: Mama said I could help with the goats!

String.Source: What'cha doing in Left Hand? Do you dig up rocks too, like my mom?
String.Dest: What'cha doing in Left Hand? Do you dig up rocks too, like my mom?

String.Source: If you beat up my sister Sissel, I won't tell.
String.Dest: If you beat up my sister Sissel, I won't tell.

String.Source: I had a dream that there was a good dragon. He was old and gray, but he wasn't scary.
String.Dest: I had a dream that there was a good dragon. He was old and gray, but he wasn't scary.

String.Source: As you will, my Thane. I will protect you with my life.
String.Dest: As you will, my Thane. I will protect you with my life.

String.Source: I'll be right here. Be careful now!
String.Dest: I'll be right here. Be careful now!
